content: the snowman can be knitted in whatever white blown yarn you have in your stash you can also try other qualities - just make sure that the knitted fabric is dense enough to hold the filling nicely the snowman can be filled with wadding or with scraps note use light scraps dark scraps can show through the fabric the hat and scarf can be knitted in most of the leftover yarn of thin wool you have in your stash try different color combinations and qualities the snowman is worked from the top down and shaped using increases and decreases the head is worked first and filled with wadding safety eyes are placed you can also embroider eyes later if you don t want to use safety eyes decreases are worked for the neck and then increases are worked for the body the body is filled with wadding the nose is worked separately and sewn on the mouth and coal buttons are embroidered on the scarf is worked in stockinette stitch back and forth and fringe is finally sewn or crocheted on the hat is knitted from the brim up and finished with a cute pompom wooly the snowman is part of quistknit s advent calendar in 2025 the snowman in the pictures in the pattern is knitted in based design vibes in the color basic the mouth and coal buttons are embroidered with leftover yarn from rauma garn lamull in color l15 black the nose is knitted in rauma garn lamull in color l27 guloransje the hat is knitted in rauma garn lamull in color 411 brunmelert the scarf is knitted in oliva fibers petite sock in color festive trio no 1 green mini **size ** onesize **total length not including hat ** approx 10 cm **gauge ** 16 st / 10 cm snowman 28 st / 10 cm clothes and nose **suggested needle size ** 4 0 mm us6 and 3 0 mm us2 5 **recommended yarn snowman ** based design vibes 50 g = 150 m 15 g **recommended yarn nose ** rama garn lamull 50 g = 350 m 1 g **recommended yarn hat ** rauma garn lamull 50 g = 350 m 8 g **recommended yarn scarf ** oliva fibers petite sock 100 g = 425 m 5 g **notions ** polyester filling black embroidery yarn for eyes and buttons safetyeyes black 4-6 mm **level of difficulty ** 2/5 this product is a digital knitting pattern which is delivered as a pdf-file which you can download after purchase the pattern is available in norwegian and english translations to additional languages can be considered upon request
